// {{{ NX.Date.parseFunctions

/**
 * @class NX.Date
 */

/**
 * @method parseFunctions
 *
 * "write it"
 *
 * @param o {Object} xxx
 * @return {Object}
 */
module.exports = {

    "MS": function(input, strict) {

        var re = new RegExp('\\/Date\\(([-+])?(\\d+)(?:[+-]\\d{4})?\\)\\/');
        var r = (input || '').match(re);

        return r? new Date(((r[1] || '') + r[2]) * 1) : null;
    }

};

// }}}

/*
 * Local variables:
 * tab-width: 4
 * c-basic-offset: 4
 * c-hanging-comment-ender-p: nil
 * End:
 */
